added.title: Dreamweaver
added.instruction: Write a bedtime story starring your baby.
added.info: Craft a personalized bedtime story featuring your baby as the hero. This strengthens your bond, sparks their imagination, and creates a unique story to share.

added.title: Jurassic Bugs
added.instruction: Debug the oldest code you've ever written.
added.info: Revisit and debug your earliest coding attempts. It's a journey into your programming past, offering a chance to improve old work and reflect on your growth.

added.title: Pop Quiz(z)
added.instruction: Complete FizzBuzz.
added.info: Test your coding skills with the classic FizzBuzz challenge. This simple exercise reinforces fundamental programming concepts.

added.title: Zero Star(bucks)
added.instruction: Write a review of your worst coffee experience.
added.info: Share your unfortunate caffeine experience by reviewing the worst coffee ever. It's a humorous way to express your standards and potentially save others from a similar fate.

added.title: Press Start
added.instruction: Learn the basics of making a game
added.info: Dive into the world of game development by learning its fundamentals. This challenging endeavor combines creativity, logic, and technical skills.

added.title: From Ashes, Breakfast
added.instruction: Write a recipe starting with “burnt toast.”
added.info: Get creative in the kitchen by inventing a recipe that salvages burnt toast. It's a fun exercise in culinary improvisation and problem-solving.

added.title: Ripple Effects
added.instruction: Photograph a reflection in a puddle.
added.info: Capture the world in a different light by photographing a puddle's reflection. It's a chance to find beauty in the mundane and see from a new perspective.

added.title: This Way, Somewhere
added.instruction: Photograph a public sign.
added.info: Find humor or irony by photographing a public sign in an unexpected setting. It's a unique photographic challenge that plays with meaning and context.

added.title: Background Character
added.instruction: Find a stranger with matching outfits.
added.info: Observe your surroundings and find a stranger whose outfit blends seamlessly with the environment. It's a real-life game of "Where's Waldo?" that highlights camouflage in everyday life.

added.title: Toothpaste Tightrope
added.instruction: Brush your teeth on one leg.
added.info: Improve your balance and multitask by standing on one leg while brushing. It's a simple way to add a physical challenge to your daily routine.

added.title: Page Exchange Program
added.instruction: Swap a book with someone.
added.info: Share your love of reading by exchanging a book with a stranger. It's a spontaneous way to connect with others and discover new literature.

added.title: Steam Dream
added.instruction: Go to the spa.
added.info: Indulge in self-care with a spa visit. It's a chance to relax, rejuvenate, and enjoy some well-deserved pampering.

added.title: At First Light
added.instruction: Watch the sunrise.
added.info: Greet the day by witnessing the beauty of a sunrise. It's a peaceful experience that connects you with nature's rhythm.

added.title: Notes to Tomorrow
added.instruction: Write a letter to a future generation.
added.info: Pen a letter to those who will come after us. Share your hopes, dreams, and wisdom with the future.

added.title: Mini Manor
added.instruction: Build a model of your dream home.
added.info: Design and construct a tiny version of your ideal house. It's a creative project that lets you envision and build your perfect space in miniature.

added.title: Roots in Time
added.instruction: Research the history of your hometown.
added.info: Discover the past of your hometown. Unearth local stories, historical events, and the people who shaped your community.

added.title: Crayon Scribbles
added.instruction: List your favorite childhood memories.
added.info: Revisit the joys of your past by listing cherished childhood memories. It's a nostalgic journey that highlights the moments that shaped you.

added.title: One Cup Away
added.instruction: Try a new type of tea.
added.info: Explore the vast world of tea by sampling a new variety. Discover different flavors, aromas, and potential health benefits.

added.title: Memory, Folded
added.instruction: Create a digital scrapbook.
added.info: Preserve your memories by making a digital scrapbook. It's a modern way to compile and showcase your cherished photos.

added.title: String and Song
added.instruction: Learn to play the ukulele.
added.info: Dive into the world of music by learning a ukulele song. It's a fun, accessible way to develop a new musical skill.

added.title: Empty Chairs
added.instruction: Write a letter to a local politician.
added.info: Engage in civic action by writing to a politician. Share your views and advocate for change on issues you're passionate about.

added.title: The Bibliophile
added.instruction: Make a list of your favorite book quotes.
added.info: Compile a list of meaningful quotes from your favorite books. It's a way to capture the wisdom and beauty of the written word.

added.title: Pivot
added.instruction: Try a new type of exercise class.
added.info: Step out of your comfort zone and join a new exercise class. It's a chance to challenge your body in new ways and potentially discover a new favorite workout.

added.title: Dusty Pages
added.instruction: Research a famous historical event.
added.info: Deepen your understanding of the past by researching a renowned historical event. Learn about its causes, consequences, and significance.

added.title: Cut to Favorites
added.instruction: Make a playlist of your best movies.
added.info: Create a playlist of the soundtracks from your favorite films. Relive cinematic moments through their iconic scores.

added.title: Kneadful
added.instruction: Try a new type of bread recipe.
added.info: Expand your baking skills by tackling a new bread recipe. Enjoy the process of kneading, baking and the aroma of fresh bread.

added.title: Virtuoso
added.instruction: Create a digital painting using a tablet.
added.info: Explore the world of digital art by creating a painting on a tablet. Experiment with different brushes, colors, and techniques.

added.title: Decalogue
added.instruction: Learn to say "thank you" in ten languages.
added.info: Express gratitude in multiple languages. It's a small but meaningful way to connect with different cultures.

added.title: Talk To Me
added.instruction: List out your favorite podcasts.
added.info: Curate a list of your go-to podcasts. Share your recommendations and discover new ones from others.

added.title: Empty Your Burdens
added.instruction: Try a new meditation technique.
added.info: Explore different meditation practices to find what resonates with you. Enhance your mindfulness and inner peace.
